item.description:
The Artist: 2011's silent film.  Winner of 5 Oscar's, including Best Picture.  The first silent film to win an Oscar in 83 years.  The film starts at 7:30 pm.

Shot in black and white, the film depicts 1920's as "talkies" begin to move into a realm where most actors of the time feared to tread.  Our hero (Jean Dujardin) is such an actor, "starring" in swashbuckling films of the era, he is not prepared for the future, so takes on a young ingenue (Berenice Bejo) and teaches her everything he knows.
item.name: The Artist
